name: Temporal Temple (itch)
description:
Temporal Temple

----=[ ]=----

Use your Time Rift abilities to escape the temple!

Record your previous actions within a space, and play them back to solve puzzles!

--=--

Controls

A + D - Move

S - Crouch / Cancel Time Rift Placement

Space - Jump

Right Click - Place Time Rift

Scroll - Change Time Rift Size

Left Click - Grab A Box (To be moved with it)

E - Push A Box / Use Objects

R - Reset Level

ESC - Open / Close Menu

--=--

--=--

Music

Background Music  : Synapse by Shane Ivers

 https://www.silvermansound.com/free-music/synapse

--=--
